percentDiffCalc.title: Percentage Difference Calculator
percentDiffCalc.description: Find the percent difference between two positive numbers greater than 0. It is usually calculated when you want to know the difference in percentage between two numbers.
percentDiffCalc.note: NOTE: Percent Difference is not the same like

percentChange.title: Percent Change Calculator
percentChange.description: The Percentage Change Calculator will calculate the change from one number to another and express it as an increase or decrease. Example: From 100$ to 200$ is a 100% increase (change), but from 200$ to 100% is 50% decrease.

tireSizeCalculator.title: Tire Size Calculator
tireSizeCalculator.description: The Tire Size Calculator takes four parameters: width, aspect ratio, and wheel size. The calculator calculates the tire diameter based on these parameters and returns the result. The tire diameter is calculated by adding the tire's width, aspect ratio, and wheel size.

percentage.title: Percentage Calculator
percentage.description: The Percentage Calculator will find what percent of X is Y.

bmi.title: Body Mass Index Calculator
bmi.description: BMI is a measurement of a person's leanness or corpulence based on their height and weight, and is intended to quantify tissue mass. It is widely used as a general indicator of whether a person has a healthy body weight for their height.

tipCalculator.title: Tip Calculator
tipCalculator.description: Here's a simple formula to calculate the tip: Tip amount = Total bill amount * (Tip percentage/100). You can adjust the tip percentage based on your level of satisfaction with the service. Common tip percentages are 15% to 20%.

gratuityCalculator.title: Gratuity Calculator
gratuityCalculator.description: Where Total bill amount is the cost of your bill before the tip, and Tip percentage is the percentage of the bill you want to leave as a gratuity. You can adjust the tip percentage based on your level of satisfaction with the service. A common tip range is 15% to 20%.

discountCalculator.title: Discount Calculator
discountCalculator.description: A discount calculator is a tool used to calculate the final price of a product after a discount is applied. For example, if the original price of a product is $100 and the discount percentage is 20%, the discounted price would be 100 - (100 * (20/100)) = 80

bmr.title: Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) Calculator
bmr.description: The basal metabolic rate (BMR) is the amount of energy needed while resting in a temperate environment when the digestive system is inactive.

ageCalc.title: Age Calculator
ageCalc.description: Age calculator helps you to calculate the exact age and how old are you in years, months, weeks, days, hours, minutes, and seconds. Even you can calculate the interval between two dates with this age our age calculator.
ageCalc.wrongValue: Age at Date should be greater than Date of Birth.

conversionRateCalc.title: Conversion Rate Calculator
conversionRateCalc.description: Conversion rate is a percentage of your site visits or ad viewers which complete the desired target. High conversion rate is crucial to the success of your business and a low conversion rate means your business might be in a trouble. When you have a high conversion rate, it lets you know that you're doing something right with your marketing campaign.

simpleLoanCalc.title: Simple Loan Calculator
simpleLoanCalc.description: Your monthly payment for a loan will depend on the amount, term, and interest rate of the loan. Use the inputs below to get a sense of what your monthly payment could end up being.

profitMarginCalc.title: Profit Margin Calculator
profitMarginCalc.description: The profit margin calculator calculates net profit and profit percentage of sales from the cost and revenue. The net profit margin is net profit divided by revenue.

marginCalc.title: Margin Calculator
marginCalc.description: The gross margin percentage calculator mark up percentage and gross profit of a sale from the cost and revenue, or selling price, of an item.

dogAgeCalculator.title: Dog Age Calculator
dogAgeCalculator.description: Dogs mature more quickly in their first two years of life and then start to slow down. The following formula is commonly used to estimate a dog's age in human years.

catAgeCalculator.title: Cat Age Calculator
catAgeCalculator.description: Cats mature more quickly in their first two years of life and then start to slow down. The following formula is commonly used to estimate a cat's age in human years.

cmToInchesConverter.title: CM to Inches Converter
cmToInchesConverter.description: To calculate CM to Inches you should divide by 2.54 or multiply by 0.3937. Example: 25cm are 9.84 inches.

mmToInchesConverter.title: MM to Inches Converter
mmToInchesConverter.description: To calculate MM to Inches you should divide by 25.4. Example: 250mm are 9.84 inches.
